ai.summary: A 7.3 km moderate circular walk around the Osterley estate grounds, offering parkland, historic features, and pleasant views near the UK.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly well-maintained gravel and tarmac paths with some grassy sections; gentle rises and some uneven surfaces near historic grounds.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather forecasts and any estate restrictions before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and bring waterproof clothing. Stay on marked paths, watch for other walkers and cyclists on shared routes, and supervise children. Carry plenty of water and a small snack; know local emergency numbers and have a mobile phone.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) typically offer the most pleasant conditions, with milder weather and longer daylight for this 7.3 km walk.

seo.title: Long Estate Walk, Osterley – 7.3 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the 7.3 km Long Estate Walk near Osterley, UK. A moderate, scenic trail through estate parkland with historic features and tranquil views.
